name: Mushroom Pizza
effect: Restores 26-30% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 450-790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm the cheese stretches out long, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
source: Obtained from a Precious Chest just north of the tower in Stormterror's Lair, Monstadt
